title: Nisus Finance makes exit from Advaitha Ventures’ housing project in Bangalore - Economic Times
content: Nisus Finance makes exit from Advaitha Ventures’ housing project in Bangalore  Economic Times
description: The deal is among few such instances as many large non-banking finance companies (NBFCs) and banks are finding it difficult to get a complete exit from their legacy investments in the real estate sector post Covid19 pandemic.
